last_episode_to_air.name: Happily Ever After
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bong Pal waits for Hyun Ji to get into college so they can attend together. Chun Sang and In Rang try to keep Blood Sausage Soup alive.

name: Bring It On, Ghost
overview: Hyun-Ji studied for her 19 years before she died in an accident. She is now a ghost and has wandered around the world for several years. Hyun-Ji then meets exorcist Park Bong-Pal. Hyun-Ji and Bong-Pal listens to various stories from ghosts and sends them to the otherworld.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A college student with psychic abilities takes in an amnesiac ghost as his roommate -- who ends up helping him hunt down spooky spirits.

episodes.name: A Kiss
episodes.overview: Desperate to find members for their ghost-catching club, Chun Sang and In Rang live stream a trip to a haunted school. Small-time exorcist Park Bong Pal is summoned to the same school and meets Kim Hyun Ji, the ghost of a high school girl.

episodes.name: Gampo Inn
episodes.overview: Hyun Ji refuses to leave Bong Pal alone. Chun Sang and In Rang are given a week to evacuate their club space.

episodes.name: Miz and Her Haters
episodes.overview: Bong Pal and Hyun Ji decide to live together. A gamer who hacked Chun Sang’s account gets him suspected of murder

episodes.name: At Sauna
episodes.overview: Hyun Ji’s tutoring does not go as well as expected. Chun Sang and In Rang scramble to pay off their debts.

episodes.name: A Child Ghost and Bong Pal's Memories
episodes.overview: Chun Sang and In Rang offer Bong Pal a partnership deal. Hyun Ji finds herself getting jealous of Seo Yeon.

episodes.name: A Ghost in the Water
episodes.overview: The newly formed ghost-hunting club goes on a retreat. Hey Sung is questioned by the police about No Hyun Joo’s death.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: Myung Chul investigates his suspicions. Chun Sang lands a potential investor for Blood Sausage Soup.

episodes.name: The Ferris Wheel
episodes.overview: In Rang’s crush on Hyun Ji grows. Blood Sausage Soup is called to a closed mental institute.

episodes.name: A Human and a Ghost
episodes.overview: Bong Pal and Hyun Ji go on a date. The police receive a confession about Hyun Joo.

episodes.name: Bong Pal's Birthday
episodes.overview: Myung Chul meets Hye Sung and decides Bong Pal needs protection. Hyun Ji questions if staying with Bong Pal is the right decision.

episodes.name: Hyun Ji Starts to Remember
episodes.overview: Bong Pal and In Rang have a hard time committing to work. Hyun Ji gains more memories and unwittingly puts herself in danger.

episodes.name: Hyun Ji Wakes Up from a Coma
episodes.overview: Bong Pal is at a loss when Hyun Ji doesn’t remember him. Hye Sung starts a new plan to silence Hyun Ji.

episodes.name: Hyun Ji Tries to Get Her Life Back
episodes.overview: Bong Pal distances himself as he waits for Hyun Ji’s memory to return. Chun Sang and In Rang ask the police to reinvestigate the hit-and-run.

episodes.name: Bong Pal's Father Is Found
episodes.overview: Park Ji Hoon’s body is found. Myung Chul realizes what happened five years ago, but hesitates to tell Bong Pal.

episodes.name: The Grand Battle
episodes.overview: Bong Pal, Chun Sang, and In Rang chase Professor Joo after he kidnaps Hyun Ji.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After
episodes.overview: Bong Pal waits for Hyun Ji to get into college so they can attend together. Chun Sang and In Rang try to keep Blood Sausage Soup alive.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A college student with psychic abilities takes in an amnesiac ghost as his roommate -- who ends up helping him hunt down spooky spirits.
